attributes.action: make Eastenders star Adam Woodyatt to once again grow his wonderful moustache.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bring back Beales muzzy. Its a national treasure and a beautiful construction of upper lipped facial puberty that should be celebrated by all. We want Adam Woodyatt to grow the moustache once again and re-create that moment of magic for us all.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
